result.title: To get name of those coders who write neat code (c++)
result.content: HI, codeforces, I am an aspiring programmer, eager to gain knowledge. I want to know name of those coders who write neat codes, without macros and very reading friendly in c++. I have got one for that and he is rajat1603. I would like to know some more coders of this type, so that I can read thier code and understand whenever I feel that editorial is difficult to understand. Please do help.
